post_title: Very very poor Lajoie bat Tolstoi $375
post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

Please note that this card is in 4 pieces.

$270

For those who might be interested in this very nice combo -- 

"Book Binder" tape does a very good job holding card together, quite strongly.  Just use it on back of card, and it's almost invisible.

Probably less than $10 at Staples, etc.


Random thought of the day, Scott :rolleyes:

I taped this guy with normal ole scotch tape and SGC was okay with it being an A, I’ll take it! 

Cheers all, and good luck with the sale Luke

Gotta love a Binder Gem

[quote name="nineunder71" post=2365078]I taped this guy with normal ole scotch tape and SGC was okay with it being an A, I’ll take it! 
:):)
Cheers all, and good luck with the sale Luke

Gotta love a Binder Gem[/QUOTE]

I know a guy that cut his T206 Stark in half…able to sell it as is, too! :)

[quote name="Kevin" post=2365360]I know a guy that cut his T206 Stark in half…able to sell it as is, too! :)[/QUOTE]

I forgot about that guy! He got chopped right in half when I was trying to break him out of an old PSA holder…..might have been the last card I ever broke out, haha

What a dummy I am, cheers Kev
